message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $22,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to stay within a tighter budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $17,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $14,000?
